meanings.sent1: The adumbral figure moved silently through the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The adumbral clouds covered the sun, casting a cool shadow over the land.
meanings.sent3: The adumbral cat stealthily followed its owner, pretending to be a ninja.
meanings.sent4: Her adumbral past haunted her dreams, a ghostly reminder of what once was.
meanings.sent5: The adumbral silhouette against the moonlit sky was both eerie and beautiful.

meanings.definition: Indicating or suggesting something in a vague way
meanings.sent1: His adumbral smile hinted at a hidden secret.
meanings.sent2: The adumbral message in the letter left her puzzled and curious.
meanings.sent3: The adumbral clues in the mystery novel kept the readers guessing until the end.
meanings.sent4: The adumbral look in her eyes revealed a mix of emotions she couldn't express.
meanings.sent5: The adumbral scent of the flowers brought back distant memories of childhood.

meanings.sent1: The adumbral entrance to the cave was easy to miss if you weren't paying attention.
meanings.sent2: His adumbral intentions were revealed only when it was too late.
meanings.sent3: The adumbral figure in the fog turned out to be a mischievous raccoon.
meanings.sent4: Her adumbral talents as an artist only became apparent after years of practice.
meanings.sent5: The adumbral truth behind the legend was finally uncovered by the brave explorer.
